title: 4 shot in west Atlanta shooting
content:
ATLANTA (CBS) -
Four people were shot in a shooting in west Atlanta on Monday night.
According to Gregory Lyon with Atlanta police, all four people were alert, conscious and breathing at the time of the incident.
The shooting occurred at the 1100 block of Joseph E. Boone Boulevard NW.
An additional person was grazed in the shooting. All of the victims were transported to Grady Memorial Hospital.
Police continue to search for suspects in the shooting.
